function.name: create_social_media_post
function.description: Create a social media post on behalf of the username provided.
function.long_description: This function allows you to create a social media post on behalf of the specified username. You can provide the content of the post, and optionally include media such as images or videos. The function will return a confirmation message once the post has been successfully created.

username.description: The username of the account on which to create the post.

text_content.description: The content of the social media post.

name: create_social_media_post
short_description: Create a social media post on behalf of a specified username.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The username of the account on which to create the post.

parameters.name: text_content
parameters.description: The content of the social media post.

example_user_queries: Create a post for @john_doe saying 'Hello, world!'
Post 'Check out my new blog post!' on behalf of @jane_smith
Can you create a social media post for @tech_guru with the content 'New product launch coming soon!'?
I want to post 'Had a great day!' on behalf of @fun_times
Please create a post for @travel_explorer with the text 'Just arrived in Paris!'
Can you help me create a social media post for @foodie with the content 'Trying out a new recipe today!'?
I want to post 'Excited for the weekend!' on behalf of @weekend_vibes
Please create a post for @fitness_fanatic with the text 'Just completed a 5k run!'
